Container.Name: PlexStarCleaner
Container.Description: A scheduled Docker container that automatically cleans up watched Plex media from Sonarr and Radarr based on user ratings, with pre-deletion warnings.

Config.Name: Dry Run
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to log actions without deleting or notifying. Set to 'false' to enable.

Config.Name: Warning Delay (Days)
Config.Description: Days since last watched to trigger a deletion warning.

Config.Name: Deletion Delay (Days)
Config.Description: Days since last watched to perform the deletion. Must be greater than warning delay.

Config.Name: Rating Threshold
Config.Description: Media with a rating BELOW this value will be deleted (e.g., 6.5 deletes 6.4 and lower).

Config.Name: Rating Mode
Config.Description: [average]: Delete if average rating is low. [any_high]: Keep if ANY user rates it high enough.

Config.Name: Series Watch Mode
Config.Description: [full]: Process series only when fully watched. [bored]: Process series after any episode is watched and rated.

Config.Name: Excluded Libraries
Config.Description: (Optional) Comma-separated list of Plex libraries to ignore (e.g., eLearning,Home Videos).

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Time of day (HH:MM) in 24-hour format to run the daily job.

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: [REQUIRED] Full URL to your Plex server (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:32400).

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: [REQUIRED] Full URL to your Tautulli server.

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: [REQUIRED] Your API key from Tautulli Settings.

Config.Name: Tautulli Notifier ID
Config.Description: (Optional) The ID of the Tautulli Notification Agent for reports.

Config.Name: Radarr URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Full URL to your Radarr server.

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Your API key from Radarr Settings.

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Full URL to your Sonarr server.

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Your API key from Sonarr Settings.
